transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir, yeh Maa Tara Handicraft se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Very good evening sir, main Tauseef baat kar raha tha Relationship Manager IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan, boliye, main theek hoon.
Executive: Sir, aapka abhi discussion hua hoga hamari team ke saath toh aapke paas WhatsApp pe ek message gaya tha usme aapne feedback mein not satisfied mark kiya hai, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji. Usi ke regarding maine connect kiya hai sir, ki kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Main ek issue 10 jan ko nahi bata paunga sir. Toh mera isme koi satisfaction hi nahi hai toh iske regarding main baat hi nahi karna chahta hoon. Theek hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye, baat jab tak nahi karenge toh resolution nahi hoga sir.
Customer: Baat toh woh sir, yeh 6-7 mahina se main baat karte karte karte thak gaya hoon. Aur aage baat hi nahi karna chahta hoon main. Isliye maine portal bhi band kar diya, dekhna bhi nahi hai. Abhi jo aage mujhe karna hai wohi main karunga. Aur nahi karna. Kyunki mujhe gol-gol ghuma ke woh sab log gol-gol ghumata hai. Main usko aur nahi ghumana chahta hoon. Aap bhi same baat karenge. Isse pehle bhi jiske saath baat hai woh bhi same baat karta hai. Toh aur nahi baat karna.
Executive: Sir dekho, woh executive hai. Usne jo bhi aapse baat kari woh I don't know kyunki aapka feedback aaya hai sir toh maine personally aapko call kiya hai sir. Ki aakhir kya aap challenges face kar rahe hain? Aapka account kyunki meri team hi manage kar rahi hai sir. Toh at least mujhe toh at least inform hona chahiye sir ki koi problem aap face kar rahe hain aur definitely hum ispe work out karenge agar koi aisi cheez hai toh sahi hone wali hai.
Customer: Mera jo IndiaMARTs mein IndiaMARTs mein jo mera jo account khula hai jiske regarding maine account khulaya hai. Mera ji sir. Jo main product hai uske regarding maine account khulaya hai, theek hai? Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Wahan pe mere ko mere paas jo ek option tha ki mera dost ka ek yeh tha business tha usme do product rolling pin aur chakla belan tha, theek hai? Ji sir. Toh maine usko add karwa diya tha. Maine bola mera main product hai jo usme se business aa jayega agar main side mein uske bhi saath agar 100 woh hase agar kuch bhi profit ho jayega toh add karke 100-100 200 ho jayega. Yahi soch ke main wohi wahan se do product sirf add kiya hoon maine, theek hai? Aur mera main product hai woh bhi woh 50 ke upar items hai maine add kiya hua. Mere main product se joining date se abhi tak sirf ek ya do ek hi hua hai, do toh hua hi nahi shayad. Theek hai. Requirement baat mere saath hua tha. Uske regarding koi leads koi baat nahi. Iske regarding maine bahut baar complaint raise kiya aur bahut baar mera RM jo hai usne baat kiya. Usne samjhaya je rolling pin ka hi buyleads aa raha hai. Aap unse hi concentrate kijiye. Usme se hi aapko paisa nikal aayega. Mere ko mera main product se business nahi aa raha main usme kya concentrate karu?
Executive: Main samajh gaya.
Customer: Mera focus toh main product mein. Mera main product mein focus hoga woh side mein tha. Maine wohi bola tha sir mujhe baar baar gol-gol ghuma rahe aap unpe kijiye usme ho jayega aapke saath yahi baat. Maine bola dekh maine toh pehla do mahine mein teen mahine ka dekha tha 90 days mein. Mujhe bola gaya tha 90 days mein agar business nahi aayega toh aapka paisa return kar diya jayega. 90 days ke baad maine complaint raise kiya tha. Toh mere ko bolne laga aapke paas koi audio recording hai aapke saath kya baat hua hai? Yahi baat hua hai IndiaMART kabhi yeh commitment nahi karta business ka. IndiaMART kabhi isne nahi bola paisa return kar dega aisa kuch nahi hai. Toh baar baar yeh cheez main 10 jan ko bata chuka hoon toh aur nahi achha lag raha. Paisa mera gaya hai toh mera gaya toh main mujhe kya karna hai main abhi karunga. Woh aur nahi isliye maine portal band kar diya. Main abhi yeh company ka kya kya resources hai higher authority ka main woh collect kar raha hoon. Abhi ek saath sab jud ke main isko highlight karunga. Mera 30,000 important hai ya yeh share market mein iska share drop karwa ke chodunga main.
Executive: Nahi dekho sir aapne agar paisa invest kiya hai sir agar IndiaMART mein aur apne business ke liye invest kiya hai toh definitely hum woh provide karenge lekin jo mujhe yahan pe dikh rahi hain cheeze aapne jaisa ki mujhe bataya ki aapke jo friend ka account tha ya aapke friend ka business tha.
Customer: Account nahi tha, product tha.
Executive: Product tha. Jaise yeh wooden rolling pin aur wooden chakla ki baat kar rahe hain kya sir aap? Haan haan haan yeh do.
Customer: Sir main ek cheez aapko batata hoon jaise aap kabhi bhi dekhenge toh aapka yeh jo Maa Tara Handicraft GST hai yeh aapke naam pe hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. Ab aapne GST mein aapko pata hoga sir ki HSN code hota hai aap jis products mein deal karte hain uska ek HSN code lete hain sir. Toh abhi main aapke account mein dekh raha tha toh char HSN code hai. Ek toh musical instruments ka HSN code hai sir aapke paas. Ek musical boxes ka hai aur ek packaging cases aur packaging boxes ka hai, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab issue kya aa raha hai sir ki aapne jo products yeh wooden rolling pin aur wooden chakla wale dal rakhe hain sir iski wajah se buyer koi bhi wooden rolling pin ya wooden chakla search karta hai sir kyunki aapne sabse zyada leads iski consume kari hai toh un buyers ko aapka account highlight ho raha hai sir. Unke samne aapka account dikh raha hai Maa Tara Handicraft wooden rolling pin aur wooden chakla mein deal karte hain sir. Lekin jo aapka khud ka main product hai sir jaise ki violin peg I think violin accessories aur violin parts, violin fingerboard I think aapka yeh main product hai, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh is koi bhi buyer yeh search karta hai na toh aapka main account jab dikh raha hai jaise hi woh aapka account open karte hain samne wooden chakla dikh jata hai. Toh aap yeh samjho ki sir koi bhi account agar kisi particular category ke liye agar best hai toh woh buyer uspe trust karta hai. Ab woh usko buyer ko wooden chakla wagera dikhta hai toh woh inquiry nahi karega sir. Woh thoda sa dissatisfied bhi ho jayega ki yeh supplier har tarike ka business kar raha hai toh ek concrete bharosa nahi kar pata. Aap ek kaam karna aap sir agar matlab possible ho matlab agar aap business sirf apne product mein chahte ho sir toh aap yeh dono product remove kijiye wooden chakla aur wooden.
Customer: Remove kiya tha sir phir se mujhe add karwa diya yeh log. 3 mahina pehle maine remove kar diya tha.
Executive: Nahi sir phir se mujhe zabardasti add karwa diya.
Executive: Koi zabardasti nahi hogi yahan pe. Main sir main abhi meri highlight mein meri nazar mein aapka account aaya hai toh main HSN code match karke aapka account dekh sakta hoon sir. Sir na aap abhi kaise use platform wagera use karte hain yeh?
Customer: IndiaMART. Laptop toh hai mujhe time nahi mil raha laptop access karne mein main mobile pe hi karta hoon.
Executive: Toh dekhiye aapki thodi si help hogi kyunki yeh aapke side se hi hai yeh sir aapke. Hello. Kya? Awaaz nahi aa rahi hai sir aapko? Haan boliye. Awaaz nahi aa rahi hai kya sir aapko? Haan haan boliye. Ji, main yeh keh raha hoon ki sabse pehle aap dekhna wooden rolling pin, wooden chakla yeh do product aap remove kijiye. Aapke jo main product hain violin pegs, violin accessories in categories ko hum add on karenge aur iske saath saath main aapko bataun sir musical equipment and accessories ki category mein hum bahut saari categories hain aur un categories ko hum aapke catalog mein add karna padega. Tab jaake woh particular buyer aapke catalog pe highlight hoga aur aapke catalog tak set of buyer reach kar payega. Warna abhi toh main dekh raha hoon sir toh pura aapka wooden rolling pin mein set hai. Saari inquiry usi ki aa rahi hai sir jo aapke dost ki hai. Is matlab aapko fayda bhi nahi hoga agar aapki deal ho jayegi aapke friend aur aapke beech mein dono ke beech barabar batega jo bhi aap logon ki deal hui ho lekin main benefit aapko nahi ho payega isme. Toh aap kya karo sir ek jab bhi aap kal ke time ya parso ke time jis din bhi aap time bataiye aap jis din free ho ek baar aap online aaiye aapka pura catalog hum sirf aur sirf violin accessories ki category mein highlight karenge jo aapka main business hai. Aap uske baad se within one to two week use kijiye aap delete kar dijiyega sir.
Executive: Sir access hamare paas nahi hota hai woh aapke side se hi karna padta hai sir. Hamare paas delete ka access nahi hota hai woh matlab hum guide kar sakte hain aapko ki aap kaise kar sakte hain. Aap ek baar woh cheeze kar loge sir toh aapko automatically woh wahan se remove ho jayega main guide kar dunga. Toh aap bataiye kis time aap free hain main ek schedule kar deta hoon meeting aur iske baad se catalog ko improve karte hain thoda sa aur within one to two week aap dekhna sir aapke main product ki aapke paas inquiries leads saari aana start ho jayegi aur main maximum categories add karwaunga kyunki IndiaMART ka pura ka pura business category pe depend karta hai sir. Aapne product kitna bhi dal rakha hai jaise aapne koi product aapne mango aap mango mein deal karte ho lekin aapne usko category mein matlab kuch log white mango search karte hain kuch log yellow mango search karte hain kuch log fresh mango search karte hain toh alag alag category add karni padti hai jisse jo bhi buyer jo bhi keyword search kare woh aapke catalog tak pahunch paaye. Toh woh aapke violin se related aur musical instrumental se related jitni bhi categories hain un saari categories ko hum aapke catalog mein add on karwayenge jisse ki aapka catalog sahi set of buyers tak reach kar paye sir. Toh aapka mujhe thoda sa waqt chahiye hoga sir iske liye aap mujhe jab bhi bataiye main apni team ke saath aur main khud personally us meeting mein join rahunga aur main samne samne aapke account pe kaam karwa ke woh dono product remove karwa ke aapka woh saari categories aur woh product highlight karwaunga. Toh kis time aap available ho jayenge sir jis time aap apna samay de paye hume thoda sa?
Customer: Kal 12:00 baje call kijiye mujhe.
Executive: Kal 12:00 baje? Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko kal 12:00 baje connect karta hoon aur ek baar baithte hain aur definitely sir agar aapne invest kiya hai toh aapko ROI milega aur aapko ek business milega. IndiaMART sir aap samjho ki ek deal bhi na wohi hum logon ki toh aapko itni badi deal order quantity hoti hai agar ki kai baar ek deal mein hi aapka pura paisa nikal jata hai sir aur aapki category toh main dekh raha tha.
Customer: Woh toh jab join kiya usse pehle se sun ke aa raha hoon bas abhi tak koi reality mein aisa kuch nahi laga.
Executive: Nahi nahi hai aap ek cheez aur dekhiyega sir aapki category mein matlab maine toh abhi tak is pure India ki main baat bata raha hoon sirf aur sirf 64 supplier IndiaMART mein registered hain jo violin ki accessories ki category mein deal karte hain aur unme aapka account ek hai sir. Toh kahin na kahin aapke liye bahut achhi opportunity hai sir. Pure India mein agar 64 account hai sir kahin na kahin toh aapke liye toh sir achhi opportunity hai ki aap achhe set of buyers ko reach kar sakte ho aur ek baar jo aapse deal kar lega toh I think product wagera aapka quality itni achhi hogi ki woh dobara aapse hi buy karega. Dobara IndiaMART pe nahi aayega sir. Hmm. Toh aap mujhe kal 12:00 baje ka samay dijiye. Kal 12:00 baje baithte hain hum log video meeting karte hain aur isko pura catalog phir se ek tarike se sahi karte hain woh wooden wali saari cheeze hata ke sir. Theek hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai baki main aapka jo catalog hai woh yahan se woh kar raha hoon matlab process karwa raha hoon kal 12:00 baje tak ke liye meeting ke liye aur aapke paas ek chhota sa feedback jayega sir mail pe toh dekh lijiyega satisfied mark kar dijiyega uspe. Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir main kal milte hain 12:00 baje sir. Hmm. Okay sir thank you so much for your time on this thing.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not satisfied with IndiaMART services.

- Wants refund as business not generated.

- Frustrated with repetitive explanations to different executives.

- Dissatisfied with buyleads for rolling pin only.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the issue with HSN codes.

- Agreed to schedule a meeting to fix catalog.

- Will highlight violin accessories category.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 12:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, catalog, hsn code, categories
